description.value:
Mounted to Astartes Armour, broadcasts tactical readings to Squad Members allowing them to benefit from it. Whilst Character is in Squad Mode, all other characters in Squad Mode receive +5 to BS Tests. Character can spend a Full Action to make a +0 Tech-Use Test to increase this to +10 for one round. Effects of multiple Signum's are not cumulative.

Effect: Distinguished

Notes: 35 R
